title: DisplaySense by Seal_Teal_404
description: DisplaySense by Seal_Teal_404 utilizes an ensemble of off-the-shelf hardware, open vision, facial expression sentiment analysis & deep learning techniques to quantify the effectiveness of a store front.
description_lemmatized: displaysense seal_teal_404 utilizes ensemble offtheshelf hardware open vision facial expression sentiment analysis deep learning technique quantify effectiveness store front
